review:
Have been going to Dr Anil Kohli since nearly three decades. He is extremely skilled at his work and handles the most complicated dental issues in a conservative manner & with minimal invasive procedures required.
His set up is very hygienic, with efficient staff and above all dr Kohli is extremely pleasant and friendly and puts one at ease whilst doing the dental procedure.
Always promptly responds to messages to give directions, when the need be.
Can never think of going to any other dentist. ThAnk You dr Anil Kohli for handling a difficult patient like me with patience & with a smile!!

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
1. Not at all hygienic. People walk-in with dirty shoes. Before surgery, there was a showpiece for wrapping shoes with plastic which was just a showoff. It should be outside the clinic but it was near to the dental chair. That person refill that with new plastic caps for shoes and didn't even wash hands before handling over the tools to the doc.

2. Treatment was not well explained, neither the different options.

3. Prior to surgery, he convinced that he is going to put in the implant and the whole surgical procedure. But as soon as surgery is stared, you meet a stranger doctor who actually knows about implants and is going to place one. At that time you cannot do anything. You cannot run from that chair.

4. Procedure, treatment and outcome were 100% translucent. Being a doctor, he should explain everything in detail. Transparency was not there.
reply_text:
We are extremely sorry to read that your experience at our clinic was unpleasant .

We are a team of doctors in practice for more than 45 years dedicated to the patient satisfaction as our top most priority. The clinic team will contact you to fix up a mutually convenient appointment to understand and to take the corrective measure for the same.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,
review:
After many years searching for a good dentist who could do a perfect job of dental implant , I had the good fortune of being referred to Dr. Anil Kohli. Every dentist I had seen for the past 5 years acknowledged even the teeth besides major ones were unstable and thought I needed to remove them or surgery…

With the information given by one of my best friends  who did same treatments near Dr. Anil Kohli, I started my miraculous treatments in the safe hands of Dr. Anil Kohli very soon afterward. He painlessly removed the broken part and did my surgery perfectly in less than 20 minutes. As the matter of fact, no bone graft, only minor gum surgery was needed, then placement after 3 months depending on bone’s condition.

I recommend Dr. Anil Kohli for anyone who needs dental implant placement or repair. I was amazed that he was able to save my teeth in just one visit without having seen me previously. I am truly delighted with the care I received.

–Amazed, delighted and very grateful
reply_text: Thanks for your kind words 🙏

review: I didn't like his work and it was too expensive. Price I paid is much higher than the quality of work done to me.
reply_text: You had visited our clinic for dental fillings and after thorough examination a filling in lower left back tooth was advised.
